http:request.doc:name: Call oracle sapi
http:request.http:headers: #[output application/java --- { "source" : vars.headers.'source', "X-CORRELATION-ID": vars.headers.'X-CORRELATION-ID', "name" : vars.headers.'name', "client_secret" : p('oracle-sapi.client_secret'), "client_id" : p('oracle-sapi.client_id'), "systemId": vars.headers.systemId, "processName": vars.headers.processName }]

http:request.doc:name: Call oracle sapi
http:request.http:headers: #[output application/java --- { "source" : vars.headers.'source', "X-CORRELATION-ID": vars.headers.'X-CORRELATION-ID', "name" : vars.headers.'name', "client_secret" : p('oracle-sapi.client_secret'), "client_id" : p('oracle-sapi.client_id'), "systemId": vars.headers.systemId, "processName": vars.headers.processName }]
http:request.http:query-params: #[output application/java --- { "lat" : vars.parameters.LATITUDE, "lng" : vars.parameters.LONGITUDE, "radius" : vars.parameters.RADIUS, "limit" : vars.parameters.LIMIT default "10", "timeDiff": "30" }]
